issue_groups.name: SoE not accurate
issue_groups.desc_snippet: The Albendazole Tablets protocol shows the following issues when pulling the schedule of procedures: Leaves out an entire page of procedures...

issue_groups.name: SoE not pulling through
issue_groups.desc_snippet: The MATCH sub-protocol is showing an empty SoE despite having one in the protocol document (page 34).

issue_groups.name: SoE not pulling through (Pneumococcal)
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Pneumococcal Phase 2 is showing an empty SoE despite having one in the protocol document (page 16-17).

issue_groups.name: SoE still not accurate after prompt updates
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Renamed and uploaded Albendazole tablets again. Still left out the middle page and while 1 tick was moved, extraction remains inaccurate.

issue_groups.name: LLM not accurate on standard terminology
issue_groups.desc_snippet: The LLM interpreted SAE as "Special Adverse Event" while the standard is Serious Adverse Events.

issue_groups.name: CRFs not pulling through from edited SoE
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Edited the SoE in the protocol journey: deleted Unblinding, added a new procedure, edited a procedure name. CRFs didn't reflect changes.

issue_groups.name: SoE Visit names incorrect
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Protocol names visits 01 to 12 where 01 is screening. LEOVA labels them Screen to Health Contact instead.

issue_groups.name: Added CRF does not display at all
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Added a CRF that would be manually generated but it didn't appear in the Form content overview screen.

issue_groups.name: CM form missing the coded values
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Coded values are available in the excel version but don't appear in the document.

issue_groups.name: Exceptionally long run time to generate form content
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Cached results are available but it takes an exceptionally long time for the data flow to run.

issue_groups.name: Form content not generating until refresh
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Clicked on the AOU form and nothing came up. Refreshed the page, received an error, then it loaded.

issue_groups.name: Form content not completely editable
issue_groups.desc_snippet: No function to delete or add fields. Only field content can be edited.

issue_groups.name: Demographics form has 2 duplicate fields (RACEOTH)
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Demographics form has duplicate RACEOTH fields.

issue_groups.name: Incorrect progress bar - not aligned with dataflow
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Progress bar indicates task is complete when generating schedule of forms, yet no content is displayed.

issue_groups.name: Schedule of forms not generating
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Waited 18 minutes but Schedule of forms didn't generate. Perhaps because of changes earlier in the process.

issue_groups.name: Rules generated inappropriately
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Form display logic conditional rules don't make sense for RESOVIR protocol.

issue_groups.name: Conditional rules do not match schedule of forms
issue_groups.desc_snippet: After confirming schedule of forms, rules appear in the table but no conditional ticks in the schedule.

issue_groups.name: CM Procedure not allocated per protocol
issue_groups.desc_snippet: CM is supposed to be a procedure at screening visit per protocol but the checkbox is blank.

issue_groups.name: Procedures allocated incorrectly
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Vaccination occurs at incorrect visits in LEOVA compared to protocol schedule.

issue_groups.name: Clinical labs allocated incorrectly
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Pregnancy marked 1 visit too soon in LEOVA for last 3 tests.

issue_groups.name: Research samples allocated incorrectly
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Protocol D294 Leukophoresis, PBMC and Serum assays are allocated to Day 280 instead of D294.

issue_groups.name: Protocol upload stalled (Phase 2 ACLF)
issue_groups.desc_snippet: After half an hour it was still thinking. Tried refresh but got a 505 error.

issue_groups.name: Protocol upload fail (MATCH)
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Uploaded Match and was directed to an error page. Uploaded again and the 2 button screen came up.

issue_groups.name: Protocol upload failed (Pneumococcal)
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Document finished processing but blank page is available for schedule of procedures.

issue_groups.name: Two CRFs generated for same procedure
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Duplicate CRF generated for the same procedure.

issue_groups.name: Added procedure not pulling into CRF table
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Added a procedure to the SoE but it does not appear in the List of CRFs.

issue_groups.name: CRFs are in random order
issue_groups.desc_snippet: CRFs seem to be in a random order: not alphabetical, not per SoE, nor by form type.

issue_groups.name: CRFs in random order (HVTN)
issue_groups.desc_snippet: The CRFs are not in order of the Schedule of Events, nor any other logical system.

issue_groups.name: Range of checks generated
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Edit checks mostly centre around dates not aligning (more than 50% of checks).

issue_groups.name: Some edit checks reference only one field
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Some edit checks don't make sense as they only look at one field value.

issue_groups.name: Editing Visit name cleared the SoE
issue_groups.desc_snippet: When visit names were corrected, all the markings/ticks in the SoE were cleared.

issue_groups.name: Adding visits doesn't auto-update sequential numbers
issue_groups.desc_snippet: When adding visits, the visit numbers don't automatically become consecutive.

issue_groups.name: Rules generated inappropriately (HVTN)
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Vaccination form is marked conditional but will always be required on a study assessing vaccinations.

issue_groups.name: No table for Visit based forms yet
issue_groups.desc_snippet: No forms listed under visit based forms. 3 CRFs listed as log forms including one that shouldn't be.

issue_groups.name: Column header numbers not sequential
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Top row of the SoE table should have column headers with sequential numbers.

issue_groups.name: Manual form classified as log form
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Leova classified a manual form as a log form rather than a visit based form.

issue_groups.name: Form display logic not displaying
issue_groups.desc_snippet: After confirming CRFs, screen moves quickly to form display logic but data isn't populated yet.

issue_groups.name: Leova logo missing on excel output
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Leova logo not visible on any of the excel downloads.

issue_groups.name: Cache not referenced after EDC mapping
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Dataflow before writing export task should reference cache if no changes to the data flow.

issue_groups.name: Date Modified not functional
protocols: A Randomised Trial... Amblyopia in Children
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Date modified on generated CRFs should reflect actual last modified date, but all say 28-12-2024.

issue_groups.name: Edit saves even when Cancel is selected
issue_groups.desc_snippet: Edited a CRF and selected Cancel instead of Save, but changes were still saved.
